title: "Garlic Mushrooms"
format: html
---

## Ingredients

| Ingredients | Amount | Amount |
|--- |---|---|
| Baby bella or portobello mushrooms | 375 grams | 750 grams |
| Olive oil or cooking oil of choice | 1.5 oz | 3 oz |
| Minced garlic | 11 grams ***or*** 2 tspns| 22 grams ***or*** 1 tbsp + 1 tsp |
| Salt | 1 tsp | 2 tsp |
| Crushed peppers | 1 tsp + $\frac{1}{2}$ tsp | 1 tbsp|
| Thyme | 1 tsp | 2 tsp |
| Oregano (optional) | 1 tsp | 2 tsp |
| Black pepper | $\frac{1}{2}$ | 1 tsp | 
| Paprika (optional) | $\frac{1}{2}$ | 1 tsp |
| Cumin (optional) | $\frac{1}{4}$ tsp | $\frac{1}{2}$ tsp |
| Ginger (optional) | $\frac{1}{4}$ | $\frac{1}{2}$ tsp |

## Directions

1. Preheat oven to 350℉.
2. Cut and slice mushrooms to desired width.
3. Combine and mix all ingredients well.
4. Transfer to a sheet pan and roast for about 20 minutes or until internal temperature is between 165℉ - 170℉.
